context_bundle.summary: Node.js and React testing with Jest, Vitest, React Testing Library, Mock Service Worker for API mocking, and comprehensive testing strategies

onboarding.quick_start: npm install -D vitest @testing-library/react @testing-library/jest-dom msw && npx vitest --ui
common_patterns: Vitest basic: 'import { describe, it, expect } from "vitest"; describe("sum", () => { it("adds numbers", () => { expect(1 + 1).toBe(2); }); });'
React Testing Library: 'import { render, screen } from "@testing-library/react"; test("renders button", () => { render(<Button />); expect(screen.getByRole("button")).toBeInTheDocument(); });'
User events: 'import userEvent from "@testing-library/user-event"; test("clicks button", async () => { const user = userEvent.setup(); await user.click(screen.getByRole("button")); });'
MSW handlers: 'import { http, HttpResponse } from "msw"; export const handlers = [http.get("/api/users", () => HttpResponse.json([{ id: 1, name: "Alice" }]))];'
Async testing: 'test("fetches data", async () => { render(<Component />); expect(await screen.findByText("Loaded")).toBeInTheDocument(); });'
Mocking modules: 'vi.mock("./api", () => ({ fetchUser: vi.fn(() => Promise.resolve({ name: "Alice" })) }));'
Coverage: 'vitest --coverage' with @vitest/coverage-v8 for code coverage reports
known_errors: Cannot find module: Install @types packages, check tsconfig paths and moduleNameMapper in vitest.config
Act warning: Wrap state updates in act() or use async utilities like findBy* queries
MSW not intercepting: Ensure server.listen() in beforeAll, server.close() in afterAll
Timeout error: Increase timeout with 'test("name", async () => {}, { timeout: 10000 })'
Mock not working: Check mock is called before component render, use vi.clearAllMocks() in beforeEach
Snapshot mismatch: Review changes, update with 'vitest -u' if intentional
